Suite Saint-Clair

  • Home
  • Rooms
  • St-Clair

The "Saint-Clair" Suite

This 39 sqm (420 sq feet) luxurious & cozy suite will surprise you! The St-Clair Suite is located on the first floor, South and West exposition; it is named after its stunning panoramic view of the St-Clair bay and the surrounding hills. In addition, there is a beautiful 9 sqm (97 sq feet) furnished loggia.

The room features a Queen Bed (160x200cm) for 2 guests, a private tumbled marble bathroom with a bath, a walk-in shower, a separate toilet and a dressing room equipped with a safe, a mini refrigerator, and a courtesy tray.

For your convenience, we provide bathrobes, and a hair dryer.

The St-Clair Suite has reversible air-conditioning.

You will enjoy Free WI-FI access and flat screen TV in the room.

In order for you to travel light, we also provide pool towels.

This suite is non smoking.

Amenities

Air-Conditioning
Free Wi-Fi
Outdoor Kitchen
Swimming Pool
Sea View
Landscaped Garden
from 190€/per night
  • Capacity: 2 Adults
  • Size: 39m²
